text: Yelena Flekontovna Shatkovskaya () (born December 15, 1957, Arkhangelsk, RSFSR, USSR) is a Soviet and Russian scientist, the first and only director of the Kenozersky National Park of the Ministry of Natural Resources and Ecology of the Russian Federation since 1991, Honored Worker of Culture of the Russian Federation (2013), honorary citizen of the Arkhangelsk region (2018). In June 2019 Russia Day in a ceremony in the Grand Kremlin Palace she received the State Prize of the Russian Federation for the year 2018 for her contribution to the preservation of the historical, cultural and natural heritage of Russia.Объявлены лауреаты Госпремии 2018 года // Президент РоссииЕлена Шатковская – лауреат Госпремии 2018 года // Правительство Архангельской области. ==References== Category:State Prize of the Russian Federation laureates Category:Recipients of the Medal of the Order "For Merit to the Fatherland" II class Category:Russian scientists Category:People from Arkhangelsk Category:1957 births Category:Living people
title: Yelena Shatkovskaya
